survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with E-Commerce Delivery Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with various aspects of e-commerce delivery services, including speed, reliability, and customer service.

questions.question_text: How often do you shop online?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you shop online?

questions.question_text: Which e-commerce platforms do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which e-commerce platforms do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery speed of your online orders?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the delivery speed of your online orders?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced a delayed delivery?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no radio button for this question.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced a delayed delivery?

questions.question_text: If yes, how was the issue resolved?
answer_options: Received a discount on future purchases
